title: Royal Enfield sales rise over two-fold to 82,097 units in Sep
description: Motorcycle maker Royal Enfield on Saturday reported an over two-fold rise in total sales at 82,097 units in September 2022. The company had sold 33,529 units in the same month last year, Royal Enfield said in a statement.
